document_data.name: Lannon siblings
document_data.mainbody: '''Lannon siblings''' were villagers of [[West Harbor]] on the [[Sword Coast North]] in the 1370s [[DR]].
document_data.History: These teenagers were contestants of the [[Harvest Fair]] brawl. The [[Kalach-Cha]], aided by [[Bevil Starling]] and [[Amie Fern]], needed to defeat them to pass to next round.
